Personal Bicycles - With cars no longer operational, individuals could utilize their personal bicycles as a means of transportation. This option would be cost-effective, environmentally friendly, and a great way to get exercise. Confidence Score: 0.8

Electric Scooters - Another viable option would be to use electric scooters, which are already gaining popularity in many cities. They are easy to maneuver, require minimal maintenance, and can travel long distances on a single charge. Confidence Score: 0.9

Horse-Drawn Carriages - In a more nostalgic approach, horse-drawn carriages could become a popular mode of transportation. This option would provide a unique and romantic experience, while also being a sustainable and environmentally friendly option. Confidence Score: 0.7

Riverboats - For longer distances, riverboats could be used to travel between cities. This option would provide a relaxing and scenic journey, while also being a cost-effective and environmentally friendly mode of transportation. Confidence Score: 0.8

Personal Aircraft - For those who have the means, personal aircraft such as helicopters or small planes could be used to travel between cities. This option would provide the fastest and most convenient mode of transportation, but would also be the most expensive. Confidence Score: 0.9
